hibernate-mapping.query: select new coadto( c.ACode, c.AccountName, c.DCODE ) from ChargeOfAccount as c where c.ACode = :aCode and c.DCODE = :sourceBranchCode

select new coadto( c.ACode,c.AccountName,c.DCODE ) from ChargeOfAccount as c inner join c.COAAccountName as cs where (cs.AccountName=:sourceBankAccountName or cs.AccountName=:otherBankAccountName) and c.DCODE=:sourceBranchCode and cs.CurrencyCode=:currency and cs.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBranchCode
select new coadto (c.AccountName) from ChargeOfAccount as c where ACode = :acode and Active = true
select new coadto( c.AccountName, c.Active ) from ChargeOfAccount as c where ACode = :encashAccount
select new coadto( c.ACode ) from ChargeOfAccount as c where ACode = :aCode and Active = true
select new coadto( c.ACode ) from ChargeOfAccount as c where c.ACode =: aCode and c.DCODE=: dCode and c.Active = true
select new coadto( c.ACode ) from ChargeOfAccount as c where ( c.ACode =: aCode ) and c.Active = true
update ChargeOfAccount c set c.AccountName =: accountName, c.UpdatedUserId =: updatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate =: updatedDate where c.ACode =: aCode and c.DCODE =:dCode and c.Active = true

select new coadto( c.ACode, c.AccountName, c.DCODE, c.ACType, c.PDate, c.CBMACode, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from ChargeOfAccount as c where c.Active = true
select distinct new coadto( c.ACode, c.AccountName, c.ACType, c.CBMACode, c.Active ) from ChargeOfAccount as c where c.Active = true

select new coadto( c.ACode, c.AccountName, c.DCODE, c.ACType, c.PDate, c.CBMACode, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from ChargeOfAccount as c where c.ACode = :aCode and c.Active = true

c.AccountName, c.CreatedUserId ) from ChargeOfAccountSetup as c where c.AccountName = :accountName and c.SourceBranchCode =:sourceBranchCode and c.CurrencyCode=:currency and c.Active = true
select c.AccountName from ChargeOfAccount as c where c.ACode = :aCode and c.DCODE =:sourceBranchCode and c.Active = true

select new coadto ( c.ACode, c.AccountName ) from ChargeOfAccount as c where c.ACType = 'L' and c.Active = true order by c.ACType

select new coadto ( c.ACode, c.AccountName, c.DCODE, c.ACType, c.PDate, c.CBMACode, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from ChargeOfAccount as c where c.ACType = 'L' and c.ACode= :acode and c.Active = true order by c.ACType
